message: Is this something that others would find useful to be in the social-auth module? Anyone want to add/commit the code? :)

@jacobg, I think that profile dependency is too strong to the app, meanwhile, any handler attached to socialauth_registered signal is able to do this profile check and do user.is_new = True in case it doesn't have a profile and your user will get redirected.

@omab, I see how your way will also accomplish the same thing. But just a note, that the get_profile method is totally decoupled from the app. It is a Django API call. See the following:
https://docs.djangoproject.com/en/dev/topics/auth/#storing-additional-information-about-users
@jacobg yeah, but not every site uses it, so adding this dependency will make those site mark users as new when they aren't. A setting is needed for this at least.
@omab: I agree a toggle switch setting would be good.
